title: Marinas and Recreational Boats
fullText:
Electrical installations in marinas and recreational boats shall comply with AS/NZS 3004.
NOTES:
1. AS/NZS 3004 is a two-part standard as follows:
(a) AS/NZS 3004.1 provides requirements for electrical installations on marinas.
(b) AS/NZS 3004.2 provides requirements for electrical installations in recreational boats.
2. In Australia, for electrical installations on commercial vessels, refer to the Australian Maritime Safety Authority, National Marine Safety Committee's National Standard for Commercial Vessels, Part C: Design and construction—Section 5: Engineering—Subsection 5B: Electrical (NSCV C5B).
